sourcesContent:
<template src="./template.html"></template>
<style src="./style.css"></style>
<script>
    import { useOsStore } from '@/stores/os.store';

    export default {
        name: "TaskBar",
  
        data() {
            return {
                currentTime: '',
                timer: null
            }
        },
  
        computed: {
            osStore() {
                return useOsStore();
            }
        },
  
        methods: {
            updateTime() {
                const now = new Date();
                this.currentTime = now.toLocaleTimeString('ru-RU', { 
                    hour: '2-digit', 
                    minute: '2-digit' 
                });
            },
    
            getAppIcon(appName) {
                const icons = {
                    notepad: 'üìù',
                    explorer: 'üìÅ',
                    calculator: 'üßÆ',
                    settings: '‚öôÔ∏è'
                };
                
                return icons[appName] || 'üìÑ'
            },
    
            toggleWindow(windowId) {
                const window = this.osStore.windows.find(w => w.id === windowId);
      
                if (window) {
                    if (window.isMinimized) {
                        // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –æ–∫–Ω–æ —Å–≤—ë—Ä–Ω—É—Ç–æ - –≤–æ—Å—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ–º
                        window.isMinimized = false;
                        this.osStore.activateWindow(windowId); // –ò–°–ü–û–õ–¨–ó–£–ï–ú activateWindow
                    } else {
                        // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –æ–∫–Ω–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç–æ - –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–∏—Ä—É–µ–º
                        this.osStore.activateWindow(windowId) // –ò–°–ü–û–õ–¨–ó–£–ï–ú activateWindow
                    }
                }
            },
    
            toggleStartMenu() {
                console.log('–ú–µ–Ω—é –ü—É—Å–∫');
            }
        },
  
  mounted() {
    this.updateTime()
    this.timer = setInterval(this.updateTime, 1000)
  },
  
  beforeUnmount() {
    if (this.timer) {
      clearInterval(this.timer)
    }
  }
}
</script>
